attributes.title: Paramashivoham Oneness Capsule 363 Muruga Darshan to remove all fear (PSML2 30Mar2020)
attributes.description: Muruga is the the energy that can dissolve our fears, that gives tremendous energy to face our fears, the intelligence that not just empowers our fears but gives us the ability to make all our fears irrelevant and make that trapped energy available for superconscious explosion. Muruga is the Lord of the Swadhistana - the Fear center - the energy center that blocks our expansion that blocks us experiencing the 11 dimensions of the cosmos. On 30 Mar 2020 in the unique program Paramashivoham Level 2, HDH manifested as the charming and young Lord Muruga, blessing humans today to experience Gods and other dimensions.
